TopicTitle: Stock Apollo (sort of) Style - Single Post Report

Articles.Content:
I think this may be my first try at an all stock Apollo style mission, and as I'm pretty proud of how it all went I thought it worth sharing.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

SM

Edited August 31, 2014 by Speeding Mullet
grammar derp

Well done sir! A good Apollo style mission is always fun. And stock makes for a good challenge regarding design and construction. Very nice.

W.
Nicely done! Well shred all those condolence letters for the parade!

Nice!

There's only two discrepancies with a real Apollo Mission: The Saturn V had three stages (not two), and the third stage made the TLI burn (not the CSM). But you're off to a good start.

Thanks Wallygator

Nicely done! Well shred all those condolence letters for the parade!

No no - Keep them for the next mission!

astropapi1 - Thanks! Dinklestein was told about the historical inaccuracies of his mission, but he bravely pressed ahead in the hope that no one would pick up on it!
